Inside Macintosh: Macintosh Toolbox Essentials /
Chapter 5 - Control Manager / Control Manager Reference
Resources

The Control Definition Function

The resource type for a control definition function is 'CDEF'. The resource data is
the compiled or assembled code of the function. See "Defining Your Own Control Definition Function" beginning on page 5-102 for information about creating a control definition function.
